Alliaria petiolate Matrix
```{r}

gb =  0.3171
s = 0.025
f = 616
v = 0.8228
gi =  0.5503

life_stages <- c("Seedbank", "Rosette", "Adult")
original_matrix <- matrix(c(1-gb, 0, f*v*(1-gi),
                          gb,   0, f*v*gi,
                          0,    s, 0),
                          nrow = 3, ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE, dimnames = list(life_stages,life_stages))

print(original_matrix)

```
